1.title: All Cuisines, Fully Customizable
1.desc: North Indian, South Indian,  Continental,  Mughlai, Street Food, Authentic Desi and more—menus tailored to your taste, spice level, and budget.

2.title: Fresh Ingredients & Hygienic
2.desc: We cook fresh for every order with strict hygiene standards, we use quality products and consistent quality—so your guests enjoy every bite.

3.title: Professional Expertise
3.desc: Expertly managed catering solutions designed specifically for corporate events, ensuring smooth execution and a polished dining experience.

crab_cake.name: Crab Cake
crab_cake.desc: A delicate crab cake served on a toasted roll with lettuce and tartar sauce

tuscan_grilled.name: Tuscan Grilled
tuscan_grilled.desc: Grilled chicken with provolone, artichoke hearts, and roasted red pesto

greek_salad.name: Greek Salad
greek_salad.desc: Fresh spinach, crisp romaine, tomatoes, and Greek olives

spinach_salad.name: Spinach Salad
spinach_salad.desc: Fresh spinach with mushrooms, hard boiled egg, and warm bacon vinaigrette

lobster_roll.name: Lobster Roll
lobster_roll.desc: Plump lobster meat, mayo and crisp lettuce on a toasted bulky roll
